byline.contributor: Thomas Fuller reported from Katmandu, Nepal, and Gardiner Harris from New Delhi. Bhadra Sharma contributed reporting from Katmandu and Nida Najar, Hari Kumar and Suhasini Raj from New Delhi.
byline.original: By THOMAS FULLER and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: Powerful aftershocks continued to convulse Nepal on Sunday, complicating efforts to rescue those trapped and to maintain adequate supplies of food and water.

headline.main: Nepal Terrorized by Aftershocks, Hampering Relief Efforts
headline.print_headline: Nepal Terrorized by Aftershocks That Stymie Relief Efforts

snippet: Powerful aftershocks continued to convulse Nepal on Sunday, complicating efforts to rescue those trapped and to maintain adequate supplies of food and water.
